code:
flowchart TB
  %% CyberSafe System Architecture (Functional View)
  subgraph CORE[ ]
    direction TB
    style CORE fill:#9DC7F2,stroke:#2F5D8A,stroke-width:3px

    PRE[Pre-processing\nLanguage detect • Normalize • Tokenize]
    EMO[Emotion/Risk Detection\nTF-IDF scam • DistilRoBERTa • (opt) Wav2Vec2]
    SUP[Support Module\nIntent (DIET opt) • Rule policy]
    CRI[Crisis Detection\nAho-Corasick • Fusion with scores]
    SCR[Screening Module\nPHQ-9 • GAD-7 • Scoring]
    ROUTE[Decision Routing\nCombine signals → Action + Rationale]
    ESC[Escalation Output\nHelplines • Notify contacts • Moderator]

    PRE --> EMO
    EMO --> SUP
    PRE --> CRI
    PRE --> SCR
    SCR --> ROUTE
    EMO --> ROUTE
    ROUTE --> CRI
    CRI --> ESC
    ROUTE --> ESC
  end

  UI[User Input & Sign-up\nChat (text/voice) • Auth]:::inputStyle
  STORE[(Storage & Audit)\nProfiles • Sessions • Results • Alerts]:::storageStyle

  UI --> PRE
  PRE --> STORE
  EMO --> STORE
  SCR --> STORE
  ROUTE --> STORE
  ESC --> STORE
  SUP --> STORE

  classDef inputStyle fill:#F6C3A6,stroke:#6A4527,stroke-width:2px;
  classDef storageStyle fill:#9DD6C6,stroke:#1F6F61,stroke-width:2px;
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
